about_the_game:
Star Hunter DX

~ Return of the Bullet Hell Bounty Hunter ~

The Story so Far

Betrayed by her cut-throat crew, Luna Starr - former Space Pirate captain turned Bounty Hunter - has a score to settle. As Luna, travel to 5 exotic planets to track down your mutinous mates, and face them in Bullet Hell dogfights to the death!

Stop! Bullet Time

Outnumbered and outgunned, it's a good thing Luna has an ace up her sleeve: a space fighter craft that can alter the flow of time itself! Power up the Bullet Time gauge by destroying enemies or catching their attacks in a bomb blast, then enter Bullet Time! Enemies and their projectiles will move in slow motion, while you can still fly and shoot at normal speed.

Galactic Gold Rush

Why eat lead when you could turn lead into gold? During Bullet Time, the bullets from any enemies you destroy will be converted into gold cubes to collect! Will you play it safe and quickly cash in bullets for survival, or take a risk and allow bad guys to flood the screen with fire for a massive score boost?

Eye of the Tiger

Star Hunter DX is old school hard, but wants you to succeed: the extensive practice mode will help beginners to survive, and allow pros to perfect their runs. Push it to the limit and rise to the top of the leaderboards!

Super Streaming

Why stop at the top of the leaderboards, when you could show off your skills (or practice runs) live? Star Hunter DX plays nicely with popular streaming software so that you can broadcast on your favourite site easily.

highlighted.name: I'm in It for the Money

detailed_description:
Coming soon from 1CC Games!


About the Game

Star Hunter DX

~ Return of the Bullet Hell Bounty Hunter ~

Betrayed by her cut-throat crew, Luna Starr - former Space Pirate captain turned Bounty Hunter - has a score to settle. As Luna, travel to 5 exotic planets to track down your mutinous mates, and face them in Bullet Hell dogfights to the death!

Stop! Bullet Time

Outnumbered and outgunned, it's a good thing Luna has an ace up her sleeve: a space fighter craft that can alter the flow of time itself! Power up the Bullet Time gauge by destroying enemies or catching their attacks in a bomb blast, then enter Bullet Time! Enemies and their projectiles will move in slow motion, while you can still fly and shoot at normal speed.

Galactic Gold Rush

Why eat lead when you could turn lead into gold? During Bullet Time, the bullets from any enemies you destroy will be converted into gold cubes to collect! Will you play it safe and quickly cash in bullets for survival, or take a risk and allow bad guys to flood the screen with fire for a massive score boost?

Eye of the Tiger

Star Hunter DX is old school hard, but wants you to succeed: the extensive practice mode will help beginners to survive, and allow pros to perfect their runs. Push it to the limit and rise to the top of the leaderboards!

Why stop at the top of the leaderboards, when you could show off your skills (or practice runs) live? Star Hunter DX plays nicely with popular streaming software so that you can broadcast on your favourite site easily.
legal_notice:
Do not modify or redistribute any part of this game's code in any way. Do feel free to stream, record and share footage of this game though: we want as many people as possible to know about it!

(C) 2021 Chorus Worldwide Ltd. All rights reserved. (C) 2021 1CC Games
name: Star Hunter DX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core or more
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 2GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 125 MB available space

reviews:
“So what makes Star Hunter DX so special? Well for starters the classic pixelated graphics look like the best the 16-bit era could muster, and the cut scenes and music remind you of 80’s Saturday morning cartoons.”
8/10 – Finger Guns

“Imaginative and very demanding bullet-hell action that puts familiar set pieces in a new light and sometimes even turns them upside down.”
83% – 4 Players

“Star Hunter DX nails the Bullet Hell Shmup package as a whole. The gunplay is fast, fun, and energetic, the visuals and audio are fantastic, and even though I am terrible at it I cannot stop playing. Shmup fan or not – you need to check this out.”
9.3/10 – Xbox Tavern
short_description: Betrayed by her cut-throat crew, Luna Starr - former Space Pirate Captain turned bounty hunter - has a score to settle. As Luna, travel to 5 exotic planets to track down your mutinous mates, and face them in Bullet Hell dogfights to the death!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
